span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一个简单的集合对象，该对象可用于存储一组 对象。The class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类的成员 。The following code example shows the use of the members of the class.
